messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg
leave this sort of thing to the compiler.

On Mon, Oct 3, 2011 at 3:59 PM, <r@golang.org> wrote:

> leave this sort of thing to the compiler.


The question was more one of ponies and their ETA.

On Oct 3, 2011, at 4:29 PM, Brad Fitzpatrick wrote:

> On Mon, Oct 3, 2011 at 3:59 PM, <r@golang.org> wrote:
> leave this sort of thing to the compiler.
> 
> The question was more one of ponies and their ETA.

If you build the cart before the ponies arrive, people end up depending on pulling their own carts.  Drop this.

-rob

subject: code review 5177044: sync: Once.DoArg -- discussion / question
